title: Red Rocks - Full Production
description: Full lighting and laser rig for a 9,500-cap amphitheatre show. 48x MegaPointe, 12x Kvant lasers, cryo and haze.

title: Denver Tech Summit
description: Corporate keynote production with d&b V-Series PA, LED wall, and architectural lighting for 2,000 attendees.

title: Mountain Music Festival
description: Multi-stage festival build. Main stage: full d&b rig, 80+ fixtures, laser array, cryo and flame effects.

title: Annual Corporate Gala
description: Black-tie gala production at the Colorado Convention Center. Chandeliers, uplighting, IMAG, and PA.

title: Neon Nights Festival
description: EDM festival headliner package. 20x lasers, full cryo, flame bars, and haze throughout the venue.

title: Product Launch - EcoTech
description: Product reveal with motorized LED wall, precision spot cues, and distributed PA system for 500 guests.
